name: Masquerade Manor
description:
Eric Reece is hosting a masquerade ball for his robot constituents, but all is not as it seems...

Deep in his electoral campaign, Electric Eric is finding it difficult to keep his promise of affordable electricity.

As a minion of Eric's it is your job to dance with the quests, match their moves and lead them to the chamber at the  back of the hall, where Eric can harvest their electricity.

Press WASD to move and Space to choose a dance move. Good luck!

Developers:

Kian Bennett - Programmer & Animator

Harley Driver - Environment artist & Programmer

Emily Everett - Character & Environment artist

Elliot Jermy - Programmer & Designer

Vic Primmer - Environment artist
